name: Outer Shoals
economy_niches: local lighter/repair yards for shallow-draft craft
licensed pilotage and tidal navigation guides
culture_adjustments: tide-based superstition stronger; daily rituals tied to tidal markers
weakened inland clan formalities; apprenticeship over lineage for seafaring roles
oral pilot lore and chartless seamanship valued above written records
festival calendar compressed to low-tide windows and nightlandings
constraints: ritual magic needs scarce imported reagents for navigation auguries
limited arable land; food imports required seasonally
notes: critical source of licensed pilots for State_15 fleet
harbor festivals timed to predictable spring-neap cycles
